example.eg: The oranges in the market looked good, so I bought a couple.
example.egtrans: 市场里的橙子看起来不错，所以我买了两个。

example.eg: I'm going to buy a couple of apples.
Each couple danced in perfect time to the music.
example.egtrans: 每对舞者都完美地和着音乐翩翩起舞。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 两人构成的一组, 一对

example.eg: I can't reach the potato chips; could you hand me a couple?
example.egtrans: 我够不到薯片，你能递给我几片吗？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 几个, 两三个, 一些

example.eg: I was hungry so I made myself a couple sandwiches
example.egtrans: 我肚子饿了，所以给自己做了几个三明治。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 几个, 两三个, 若干个

example.eg: A couple of days ago, I saw your brother at the supermarket.
example.egtrans: 几天前，我在超市看到了你哥哥。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 几个, 两三个, 一些

example.eg: They coupled a new engine to the train.
When icy temperatures are coupled with thick fog, driving conditions become hazardous.
example.egtrans: 凛冽的严寒加上浓雾，让驾驶条件变得非常危险。

example.eg: He remarked that the people there had no sense of decency, and would couple with one another in public, whenever they felt the urge.
example.egtrans: 他评论说，那里的人不讲一丝体面，只要欲望上来了，就可以当街与人发生性关系。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与…同床, 与…发生性关系

example.eg: Matt and Anna are such a loving couple!
The married couple wanted to start a family.
